question: NITI Aayog has partnered with which e-commerce major to launch “revamped Women Entrepreneurship Platform”?
explanation:
The nation’s premier think tank NITI Aayog has partnered with e commerce major Flipkart, to launch the revamped Women Entrepreneurship Platform.
This is seen as an effort to enhance the community experience for women entrepreneurs in India. This portal brings together women from different parts of India to realize their entrepreneurial aspirations.
